content.rendered:
Directed by Nikkhil Advani.

Written by Nikkhil Advani. Umesh Bist. Umesh Bist.

Cast Sooraj Pancholi(Sooraj). Athiya Shetty(Radha). Tigmanshu Dhulia(Shrikant Mathur). Aditya Pancholi(Suryakant Pasha Ranade) . Vivan Bhatena(Ranvijay Shekhawat). Anil Charanjeett(Sooraj’s friend (as Anil Mange)). Chetan Hansraj(Changezi). Randeep Jha(Rathudi). Kishore Kadam(Shantaram). Nisha Kalra(Athiya’s Friends). Sharad Kelkar(Dheeraj Mathur). Preiti Mamgain(Radha’s mother). Suresh Menon(BBM). Anita Hassanandani Reddy(Radha’s sister-in-law (as Anita Hassandani)). Natasha Singh(News Show Guest). Trishaan(Anondo Gangopadhyay(Gangu)). Ashish Verma(Mangesh)

Language Hindi.

Producers Monisha Advani. Madhu Bhojwani. Amar Butala. Subhash Ghai. Salman Khan. Garima Mehta. Rameshchandra Yadav.

Production Salman Khan Films. Emmay Entertainment. Mukta Arts.
